posts.title: 3 quick ways to improve your website today
posts.excerpt: Small, practical tweaks that make your site feel faster, clearer, and more trustworthy.
posts.content:
Here are three quick wins:

1) Tighten your headline.
2) Add one clear call to action.
3) Compress your images.

If you want, I can help you apply these to your own site.

posts.title: Why a simple blog helps SEO (even for small businesses)
posts.excerpt: A blog gives search engines fresh pages to index, and gives customers reasons to trust you.
posts.content:
A blog works because it adds:

- Fresh content
- More keywords (naturally)
- Internal links
- Authority over time

Keep posts short, specific, and useful.
